@Alexis Miller No one really knows _who s fault it is_ a few months ago it was Depp's fault then a few months before that it was Amber's fault.  Now the blame is right back on her, opinions change based on who releases what about the other last.  At this point, there's no real way to tell who is the worst.  The thing is I think they both at some point really liked each other, but it was clear they both had issues.  Johnny has always been in and out of rehab, while Amber has always put her career first and relationships second. So basically you had two people who had no business getting involved with each other.  


I just think this is a clear case of two people who just didn't work out and both of them are caught up with trying to prove _it's not their fault_ that things didn't work out. Both of them or at least one of them just needs to take the loss and move on.
